channel.title: Comments on: Friday Go Forward: Week 26

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Hey Clement! Glad to hear that you are back in go! Congratulations on the 1D on KGS! Definitely hope that you can hang on to it! I've never heard of Tsumegos by M. Noguchi. Is it a French book? Real life tournament are awesome! I'm so jealous that you're going to get to play so many! I definitely need to come to France soon! Best of luck in your games and I hope we can play again soon. Take care till then!
item.content:encoded:
Hey Clement!
Glad to hear that you are back in go! Congratulations on the 1D on KGS! Definitely hope that you can hang on to it!
I’ve never heard of Tsumegos by M. Noguchi. Is it a French book?
Real life tournament are awesome! I’m so jealous that you’re going to get to play so many! I definitely need to come to France soon!
Best of luck in your games and I hope we can play again soon. Take care till then!

item.title: By: Tilwen
item.dc:creator: Tilwen
item.description: Hi Ben ! It's been a long time I didn't post on your (always as great :-) ) blog, I was waiting forward to this Friday go Forward ^^. It seems like I am back in go, and I decided to read books not randomly as I previously did (like start a book, then later another, etc, and never know what I've read, understood or not). Then here is my record recently : * 1 win against 1d on tygem * 3 wins versus 1k + 3 loss versus 2d,1k,~3k(?) on KGS, some ranked, some not * GREAT NEWS : I'M 1D KGS ! ^^ (hope it'll last) And about the books : * finished the first part of Tsumegos by M. Noguchi * in the middle of the introductory problems of Get Strong At The Endgame * starting Get Strong At Life And Death (not sure i'll like this book) Another news : I'll play several "real life" tournaments after summer, one in Bordeaux (with Tiphaine, Albane and Jean, I hope they will play and progress until here :) ) and one in Lille (and I hope some others soon). This week i'll try to play at least one or two serious games each morning, ranked automatches or friendly games, we'll see. Hope I'll play interesting games and learn things ! see you soon !
item.content:encoded:
Hi Ben !
It’s been a long time I didn’t post on your (always as great ðŸ™‚ ) blog, I was waiting forward to this Friday go Forward ^^. It seems like I am back in go, and I decided to read books not randomly as I previously did (like start a book, then later another, etc, and never know what I’ve read, understood or not).
Then here is my record recently :
* 1 win against 1d on tygem
* 3 wins versus 1k + 3 loss versus 2d,1k,~3k(?) on KGS, some ranked, some not
* GREAT NEWS : I’M 1D KGS ! ^^ (hope it’ll last)
And about the books :
* finished the first part of Tsumegos by M. Noguchi
* in the middle of the introductory problems of Get Strong At The Endgame
* starting Get Strong At Life And Death (not sure i’ll like this book)
Another news : I’ll play several “real life” tournaments after summer, one in Bordeaux (with Tiphaine, Albane and Jean, I hope they will play and progress until here ðŸ™‚ ) and one in Lille (and I hope some others soon).
This week i’ll try to play at least one or two serious games each morning, ranked automatches or friendly games, we’ll see. Hope I’ll play interesting games and learn things !
see you soon !
